instruction: Summarize the article "The Benefits of an Online Education".
output: An online education has many advantages and benefits over traditional classroom learning. It offers flexible scheduling, self-paced learning, affordability, and access to resources around the world. Online learning also encourages collaboration with peers and gives students the ability to create a personalized learning environment. Additionally, students receive immediate feedback from their peers and instructors, which aids in better understanding of subject matters. In short, an online education provides students ample opportunities to acquire knowledge at their own pace, notwithstanding the physical location or circumstances.
